missing_implementations: Extracts specified data fields from the EKM Omnimeter Pulse v.4 using the EKM API Push 3 and imports them into the cloud system.
Extracted fields include meter name, meter data, meter day of week, reading date, model, address, firmware, total watt hour, voltage, amps, total power (watts), CT ratio, and frequency (hz).
Data is pulled from the EKM Omnimeter every 1 minute.
No code implementing SHA-256 hashing of incoming extracted meter data in the cloud system using a cryptographic private key was found.
